remarks: If a class' operation value for two operands is not the empty set, the operands are contained in the domain of the class, and the class restricted to the operands is a function, analogous to ~ fvfundmfvn0 . (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2020.)
statement:
ovn0ssdmfun $p |- ( A. a e. D A. b e. E ( a F b ) =/= (/) -> ( ( D X. E ) C_ dom F /\ Fun ( F |` ( D X. E ) ) ) ) $.
$d D a b $.
$d E a b $.
$d F a b $.
